name: TheUnitedPodcastShow
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This is a podcast to provide interesting insight into everyday topics with resources and additional details when available. These are internal discussions among the panel to share personal account or experiences as well as having guest who are professionals/experts to provide their views and insight. Topic range from dealing with Fear/Stress and coping with the current mainstream events such as the Pandemic and how to deal with it.
